question.questionText: Don xiangyao zai benzi shang hua yige ditu. Buzhou baokuo: 2.___,4.___

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: 2. Zhuizong tezheng. 4. zai benzi shang fuzhi tezheng.
2. zhuizhong bing jiang ta bian xiao.
2. fuzhi dao benzi shang. 4. huashang fenjiexian.
2. zhuizhong jiegou. 4. zai benzi shang huachu suoxiao de jiegou.
2. mai ge dianzi bi. 4. hua moxing.
2. fuzhi dao benzi shang. 4.zuo ge xiao de moxing.
